original: Udāna 3.2
analyzed: udāna

original: Nandasutta
analyzed: nandasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nando bhagavato bhātā mātucchāputto sambahulānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ evamāroceti:
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nandaḥ bhagavataḥ bhātā mātucchāputto sambahulānam bhikkhūnam evam āroceti

original: “anabhirato ahaṁ, āvuso, brahmacariyaṁ carāmi;
analyzed: an abhirataḥ aha āvuso brahmacariyam carāmi

original: na sakkomi brahmacariyaṁ sandhāretuṁ, sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissāmī”ti.
analyzed: na sakkomi brahmacariyam sandhāretu sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattissāmi iti

original: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho aññataraḥ bhikkhu yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho saḥ bhikkhu bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “āyasmā, bhante, nando bhagavato bhātā mātucchāputto sambahulānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ evamāroceti:
analyzed: āyasman bhante nandaḥ bhagavataḥ bhātā mātucchāputto sambahulānam bhikkhūnam evam āroceti

original: ‘anabhirato ahaṁ, āvuso, brahmacariyaṁ carāmi, na sakkomi brahmacariyaṁ sandhāretuṁ, sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissāmī’”ti.
analyzed: an abhirataḥ aha āvuso brahmacariyam carāmi na sakkomi brahmacariyam sandhāretu sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattissāmi iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā aññataram bhikkhum āmantesi

original: “ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena nandaṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantehi:
analyzed: ehi tva bhikkhu mama vacanena nandam bhikkhum āmantehi

original: ‘satthā taṁ, āvuso nanda, āmantetī’”ti.
analyzed: satthā te āvuso nandaḥ āmanteti iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā nando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ nandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho saḥ bhikkhu bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā yena āyasmā nandaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam nandam etat avoca

original: “satthā taṁ, āvuso nanda, āmantetī”ti.
analyzed: satthā te āvuso nandaḥ āmanteti iti

original: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā nando tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
analyzed: evam āvuso ti kho āyasmā nandaḥ tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnam kho āyasmanta

original: nandaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: nandam bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, nanda, sambahulānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ evamārocesi:
analyzed: saccam kira tva nanda sambahulānam bhikkhūnam evam ārocesi

original: ‘anabhirato ahaṁ, āvuso, brahmacariyaṁ carāmi, na sakkomi brahmacariyaṁ sandhāretuṁ, sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissāmī’”ti?
analyzed: an abhirataḥ aha āvuso brahmacariyam carāmi na sakkomi brahmacariyam sandhāretu sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti.
analyzed: eva bhanta iti

original: “Kissa pana tvaṁ, nanda, anabhirato brahmacariyaṁ carasi, na sakkosi brahmacariyaṁ sandhāretuṁ, sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissasī”ti?
analyzed: kissa pana tva nanda an abhirataḥ brahmacariyam carasi na sakkosi brahmacariyam sandhāretu sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattissasi iti

original: “Sākiyānī maṁ, bhante, janapadakalyāṇī gharā nikkhamantassa upaḍḍhullikhitehi kesehi apaloketvā maṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sākiyānī ma bhante janapadakalyāṇī gharā nikkhamantassa upaḍḍhullikhitehi kesehi apaloketvā mama etat avoca

original: ‘tuvaṭaṁ kho, ayyaputta, āgaccheyyāsī’ti.
analyzed: tuvaṭam kho ayya putta āgaccheyyāsi iti

original: So kho ahaṁ, bhante, tamanussaramāno anabhirato brahmacariyaṁ carāmi, na sakkomi brahmacariyaṁ sandhāretuṁ, sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissāmī”ti.
analyzed: saḥ kho aha bhante tam anussaramānaḥ an abhirataḥ brahmacariyam carāmi na sakkomi brahmacariyam sandhāretu sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattissāmi iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ nandaṁ bāhāyaṁ gahetvā—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyasmantam nandam bāhāyam gahetvā āseyyathā api nāma balavā purisaḥ

original: samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya, pasāritaṁ vā bāhaṁ samiñjeyya; evamevaṁ—jetavane antarahito
analyzed: samiñjitam vā bāham pasāreyya pasāritam vā bāham samiñjeyya evam eva jetavane antarahitaḥ

original: devesu tāvatiṁsesu pāturahosi.
analyzed: devesu tāvatisesu

original: Tena kho pana samayena pañcamattāni accharāsatāni sakkassa devānamindassa upaṭṭhānaṁ āgatāni honti kakuṭapādāni.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena pañcamattāni accharāsatāni sakkassa devānamindassa upaṭṭhānam āgatāni honti kakuṭa pādāni

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ nandaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyasmantam nandam āmantesi

original: “passasi no tvaṁ, nanda, imāni pañca accharāsatāni kakuṭapādānī”ti?
analyzed: passasi no tva nanda imāni pañca accharāsatāni kakuṭa pādāni iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti.
analyzed: eva bhanta iti

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, nanda, katamā nu kho abhirūpatarā vā dassanīyatarā vā pāsādikatarā vā, sākiyānī vā janapadakalyāṇī, imāni vā pañca accharāsatāni kakuṭapādānī”ti?
analyzed: tam kim maññasi nanda katamā nu kho abhirūpatarā vā dassanīyatarā vā pāsādikatarā vā sākiyānī vā janapada kalyāṇī imāni vā pañca accharāsatāni kakuṭa pādāni iti

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhante, paluṭṭhamakkaṭī kaṇṇanāsacchinnā;
analyzed: sā iyyathā api bhante paluṭṭha makkaṭī kaṇṇa nāsa chinnā

original: evamevaṁ kho, bhante, sākiyānī janapadakalyāṇī imesaṁ pañcannaṁ accharāsatānaṁ upanidhāya saṅkhyampi nopeti kalabhāgampi nopeti upanidhimpi nopeti.
analyzed: evam evam khalu bhante sākiyānī janapadakalyāṇī imesam pañcannam accharāsatānam upanidhāya saṅkhyam pi nā upeti kalabhāgam pi nā upeti upanidhim pi nā upeti

original: Atha kho imāni pañca accharāsatāni abhirūpatarāni ceva dassanīyatarāni ca pāsādikatarāni cā”ti.
analyzed: atha kho imāni pañca accharāsatāni abhirūpatarāni ca iva dassanīyatarāni ca pāsādikatarāni ca ati

original: “Abhirama, nanda, abhirama, nanda.
analyzed: abhirama nanda abhirama nanda

original: Ahaṁ te pāṭibhogo pañcannaṁ accharāsatānaṁ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānan”ti.
analyzed: aham te pāṭibhogaḥ pañcannam accharāsatānam paṭilābhāya

original: “Sace me, bhante, bhagavā pāṭibhogo pañcannaṁ accharāsatānaṁ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānaṁ, abhiramissāmahaṁ, bhante, bhagavati brahmacariye”ti.
analyzed: sace me bhante bhagavā pāṭibhogaḥ pañcannam accharāsatānam paṭilābhāya abhiramissāmaha bhante bhagavati brahmacariyā iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ nandaṁ bāhāyaṁ gahetvā—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyasmantam nandam bāhāyam gahetvā āseyyathā api nāma balavā purisaḥ

original: samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya, pasāritaṁ vā bāhaṁ samiñjeyya; evamevaṁ—devesu tāvatiṁsesu
analyzed: samiñjitam vā bāham pasāreyya pasāritam vā bāham samiñjeyya evam evadevesu tāvatisesu

original: antarahito jetavane pāturahosi.
analyzed: antara hitaḥ jetavane pātuḥ ahosi

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū:
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū

original: “āyasmā kira nando bhagavato bhātā mātucchāputto accharānaṁ hetu brahmacariyaṁ carati;
analyzed: kira nandaḥ bhagavataḥ bhātā mātucchā putto accharānam brahmacariyam carati

original: bhagavā kirassa pāṭibhogo pañcannaṁ accharāsatānaṁ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānan”ti.
analyzed: bhagavā kirassa pāṭibhogaḥ pañcannam accharāsatānam paṭilābhāya kakuṭa pādānam ti

original: Atha kho āyasmato nandassa sahāyakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ nandaṁ bhatakavādena ca upakkitakavādena ca samudācaranti:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmataḥ nandassa sahāyakāḥ bhikkhū āyasmantam nandam bhataka vādena ca upakkitaka vādena ca samudācaranti

original: “bhatako kirāyasmā nando upakkitako kirāyasmā nando accharānaṁ hetu brahmacariyaṁ carati;
analyzed: bhatako kirāyasmai nando upakkitakaḥ kirāyasmai nando accharānam brahmacariyam carati

original: bhagavā kirassa pāṭibhogo pañcannaṁ accharāsatānaṁ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānan”ti.
analyzed: bhagavā kirassa pāṭibhogaḥ pañcannam accharāsatānam paṭilābhāya kakuṭa pādānam ti

original: Atha kho āyasmā nando sahāyakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ bhatakavādena ca upakkitakavādena ca
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā nandaḥ sahāyakānam bhikkhūnam bhataka vādena ca upakkitaka vādena ca

original: aṭṭīyamāno harāyamāno jigucchamāno eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto
analyzed: aṭṭīyamānaḥ harāyamānaḥ jigucchamānaḥ ekaḥ vūpakaṭṭhaḥ appamattaḥ ātāpī pahitattaḥ viharantaḥ

original: nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ
analyzed: kula puttā sammat eva agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajanti tad anuttara brahmacariya pariyosāna

original: diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
analyzed: diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi

original: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
analyzed: vusitam brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati

original: Aññataro kho panāyasmā nando arahataṁ ahosi.
analyzed: aññataraḥ kho pana ayasmā nandaḥ arahatam ahosi

original: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ
analyzed: atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkanta vaṇṇā kevala kappam jetavana

original: obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ
analyzed: obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamanta

original: aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho sā devatā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitā kho sā devatā bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “āyasmā, bhante, nando bhagavato bhātā mātucchāputto āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
analyzed: āyasmā bhante nandaḥ bhagavataḥ bhātā mātucchāputto āsavānam khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati iti

original: Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṁ udapādi:
analyzed: bhagavataḥ api khalu ñāṇam udapādi

original: “nando āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
analyzed: nandaḥ āsavānam khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā nando tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā nandaḥ tassāḥ rattiyāḥ accayena yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā

original: bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā nando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā nandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “yaṁ me, bhante, bhagavā pāṭibhogo pañcannaṁ accharāsatānaṁ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānaṁ, muñcāmahaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ etasmā paṭissavā”ti.
analyzed: yam me bhante bhagavā pāṭibhogaḥ pañcannam accharāsatānam paṭilābhāya muñcāmaha bhante bhagavantam etasmai paṭissavāti

original: “Mayāpi kho tvaṁ, nanda, cetasā ceto paricca vidito:
analyzed: mayā api kho tva nanda cetasā ceto paricca vidito

original: ‘nando āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
analyzed: nandaḥ āsavānam khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati iti

original: Devatāpi me etamatthaṁ ārocesi:
analyzed: devatā api me etam attham ārocesi

original: ‘āyasmā, bhante, nando bhagavato bhātā mātucchāputto āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
analyzed: āyasmā bhante nandaḥ bhagavataḥ bhātā mātucchāputto āsavānam khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati iti

original: Yadeva kho te, nanda, anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttaṁ, athāhaṁ mutto etasmā paṭissavā”ti.
analyzed: yat eva kho te nanda an upādāya āsavehi cittam vimutta atha aham muttaḥ etasmā paṭissavāti

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi

original: “Yassa nittiṇṇo paṅko,
analyzed: yassa nittiṇṇaḥ paṅkaḥ

original: Maddito kāmakaṇḍako;
analyzed: mad ditaḥ kāmakaṇḍakaḥ

original: Mohakkhayaṁ anuppatto,
analyzed: moha kkhayam an uppatto

original: Sukhadukkhesu na vedhatī sa bhikkhū”ti.
analyzed: sukha dukkhesu na vedhati sa bhikkhū ti

original: Dutiyaṁ.
analyzed: dutiya
